definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: The deformation and breakup of liquid droplet is important in fuel explosive dispersal.
sentences.chinese: 液滴变形和破碎是燃料抛撒问题的重要过程。

sentences.english: Shop windows were shattered. Cars were smashed.
sentences.chinese: 商店玻璃破碎，汽车被砸毁，大量伤者躺在街头。

sentences.english: The arrow with Hydra’s blood shot through Nemean’s heart.
sentences.chinese: 那浸着许的毒血的箭一下子射进了阿尼破碎的心。
一个斑驳又破碎的梦境。

sentences.english: They scrambled over the broken walls and, within a very short time, captured the city.
sentences.chinese: 他们攀过破碎的城墙，用很短的时间就夺取了城市。

sentences.english: Calcareous sand is a kind of easily crushed granular materials.
sentences.chinese: 钙质砂是一种易破碎粒状材料。

sentences.english: The results can provide the basis for designing crushers.
sentences.chinese: 其结果可作为设计该破碎机的基础。

sentences.english: The pothole fractured a bolt on the axle.
sentences.chinese: 壶穴使车轴上的一只螺钉破碎。

sentences.english: The fragmentations of teacher beliefs were eventually damage education hope.
sentences.chinese: 教师信奉的支离破碎最终则损毁了教育的希望。

sentences.english: P. A. and the Risk of Breakage for 130% invoice value.
sentences.chinese: 保水债险和破碎险，金额为130%的发票金额。

sentences.english: Dear my baron, you're my broken dream.
sentences.chinese: 柯希莫，你是我支离破碎的梦想。

sentences.english: It is mainly used in high-performance two-in-one crusher.
sentences.chinese: 用于高效式二合一破碎机。

sentences.english: Shattered Type Create the illusion that text is being shattered like glass.
sentences.chinese: 粉碎型创建该文本正在像玻璃破碎的幻想。

sentences.english: To pave and break concrete foundation installing engineering to break other hard things.
sentences.chinese: 筑路及安装工程破碎混凝土和其他坚硬物体。

sentences.english: Falling raindrops break up through hydrodynamic effects .
sentences.chinese: 下落雨滴由于流体动力作用而破碎。

sentences.english: The main mineralized types are quartz vein type and alteration pattern with fracture zone.
sentences.chinese: 主要矿化类型有石英脉型和破碎带蚀变岩型。

definition: to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to rupture/to fracture/to break down/(linguistics) plosion
to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
to shatter/to smash/to break into pieces
all split up and in pieces (idiom); disunity (in an organization)/complete lack of unity/to disintegrate/falling apart/to be at sixes and sevens
